scripts.compose: docker compose up -d && pnpm prisma:generate && pnpm prisma:migrate
scripts.prisma:generate: cd apps/api && pnpm dlx prisma generate
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd apps/api && pnpm dlx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:test: cd apps/api && dotenv -e .env.test -- pnpm dlx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:push: cd apps/api && pnpm dlx prisma db push
scripts.prisma:push:test: cd apps/api && dotenv -e .env.test -- pnpm dlx prisma db push
scripts.prisma:studio: cd apps/api && pnpm dlx prisma studio
scripts.prisma:studio:test: cd apps/api && dotenv -e .env.test -- pnpm dlx prisma studio
scripts.test: pnpm prisma:migrate:test && pnpm prisma:push:test && turbo run test
scripts.test:api: pnpm prisma:migrate:test && pnpm prisma:push:test && turbo run test:api
scripts.test:webapp: pnpm prisma:migrate:test && pnpm prisma:push:test && turbo run test:webapp
scripts.test:ui: pnpm prisma:migrate:test && pnpm prisma:push:test && turbo run test:ui
